QuestData.Title: News from Nagrand
QuestData.Description:
Welcome back, $gsir:mam;.
One of Bodrick's men delivered a message about a caravan being dispatched for Nagrand. He's awaiting your approval on a new outpost.
I've been hearing whispers around camp about Nagrand. They say it's Warsong territory. They might need your help $gsir:mam;.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Bodrick Grey at your garrison in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.RewardText:
Commander. Good to have you back.
We've got some movement in Nagrand. Let me fill you in on the details.
